channel.title: Automated Leaver Penalty
channel.description:
Hey.
There should be an automated punishment for people who leave games in the middle of the match (while still alive). Implement a counter on each player which monitors the games that they have ditched. If they ditch more than 3 games within a seven day period, they are automatically temporarily banned (possibly for 12 hours) from playing the game. If the seven day period is surpassed without the 3 game counter being exceeded, the counter is reset back to 0.
This should substantially discourage the behavior of streamer worshipers. Let me know what you think.

item.title: Automated Leaver Penalty
item.dc:creator: Silcore
item.description:
You been seeing the mass leavers too recently?

Yeah. Last game I had 3 people leave by day two: the Butler, Observer, and Prince. Needless to say the Blue Dragon got completely crushed. I can brush off one or two leavers, but when they ditch critical roles it completely ruins a 20+ minute game for everyone else.
